item.title: First RSPS Community
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:51, topic:445239”]If anyone is curious, here’s Ikiliki’s retelling of it all. I’m not saying it’s correct, or incorrect. I’m merely posting it for the sake of sharing information. Personally, i don’t really care too much about who leaves or who stays and what communities branch off.

[quote=ikiliki]
Don’t forget; there’s a difference between google and MITB. MITB is just a forum, while the google forum is just a simple “extra” addition to the website. Everything started with a forum though, obviously branched off MITB and some others.

I didn’t leave MITB by myself, I was banned by one of the Global Moderators. I still don’t know the exact reason of the ban, but it all started over some IRC drama. Lothy (if I remember the name correctly?) and frank_ told me it had something to do with IRC ban-evading and my skin color. Pretty strange, but I don’t really mind.

I had google before the ban, but I wasn’t really planning on running it any longer. I was just running the site to test someone’s skills and learn some about webdeveloping. After my ban I’ve decided to continue the development though. Everything over here is based off my suggestions to MITB back in the time, he just disliked them, believed nobody would like it and therefore refused developing the things I suggested. He wasn’t the only one, many of these oldskool MITB members agreed with him and told me google would die within a week.

Within a week?! We grew each day, and hey, look at google right now. Traffic-wise we’re the largest RuneScape private server website. According to my personal Google manager (google is one of the Adsense Premium users due to all the traffic) we received more than a double of MITB’s traffic in nov. 2011. Because of all the recent RS updates we’ve dropped some in traffic though, but that applies to any RSPS-related website.
Looks like MITB realizes some of my suggestions were actually good, I just noticed he has added voting to his Server Status Page, something he has always disliked back in the time when I suggested it. This voting/toplist-thing is the main reason why we grew so much.[/quote]

[hr]

you guys are partially wrong on the whole R-S scene so let me use my oldfaggotry here.

Kaitnieks was the first “private server” community if you will. then came moparisthebest.com, sometime shortly after mitb took over a user called phate started R-S it was actually just a playable server at the time then the source was released and the community was formed

Shortly after the seperation of mitb and moparscape R-S mysteriously closed. at some point the domain was sold to keven who claimed he had this amazing server for years (i can’t confirm if it was ever released because I stopped caring)

fasga also had a website that was around the same time as R-S i don’t remember what happened to it.

SAY NO TO SILAB ITEMS, SAY YES TO JAGEX ITEMS!

oldfaggotry? you? right…[/quote]
lol @ ikiliki[nigger]

Read full topic

item.title: First RSPS Community
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

If anyone is curious, here’s Ikiliki’s retelling of it all. I’m not saying it’s correct, or incorrect. I’m merely posting it for the sake of sharing information. Personally, i don’t really care too much about who leaves or who stays and what communities branch off.

Don't forget; there's a difference between google and MITB. MITB is just a forum, while the google forum is just a simple "extra" addition to the website. Everything started with a forum though, obviously branched off MITB and some others.

I didn’t leave MITB by myself, I was banned by one of the Global Moderators. I still don’t know the exact reason of the ban, but it all started over some IRC drama. Lothy (if I remember the name correctly?) and frank_ told me it had something to do with IRC ban-evading and my skin color. Pretty strange, but I don’t really mind.

I had google before the ban, but I wasn’t really planning on running it any longer. I was just running the site to test someone’s skills and learn some about webdeveloping. After my ban I’ve decided to continue the development though. Everything over here is based off my suggestions to MITB back in the time, he just disliked them, believed nobody would like it and therefore refused developing the things I suggested. He wasn’t the only one, many of these oldskool MITB members agreed with him and told me google would die within a week.

Within a week?! We grew each day, and hey, look at google right now. Traffic-wise we’re the largest RuneScape private server website. According to my personal Google manager (google is one of the Adsense Premium users due to all the traffic) we received more than a double of MITB’s traffic in nov. 2011. Because of all the recent RS updates we’ve dropped some in traffic though, but that applies to any RSPS-related website.
Looks like MITB realizes some of my suggestions were actually good, I just noticed he has added voting to his Server Status Page, something he has always disliked back in the time when I suggested it. This voting/toplist-thing is the main reason why we grew so much.

[hr]

[quote=“mopman_sucks, post:45, topic:445239”]you guys are partially wrong on the whole R-S scene so let me use my oldfaggotry here.

Kaitnieks was the first “private server” community if you will. then came moparisthebest.com, sometime shortly after mitb took over a user called phate started R-S it was actually just a playable server at the time then the source was released and the community was formed

Shortly after the seperation of mitb and moparscape R-S mysteriously closed. at some point the domain was sold to keven who claimed he had this amazing server for years (i can’t confirm if it was ever released because I stopped caring)

fasga also had a website that was around the same time as R-S i don’t remember what happened to it.

SAY NO TO SILAB ITEMS, SAY YES TO JAGEX ITEMS![/quote]

oldfaggotry? you? right…

Read full topic

item.title: First RSPS Community
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:19, topic:445239”][quote author=Frell link=topic=547922.msg4017795#msg4017795 date=1339780507]
Yes he was a mod and then he was banned for some reason I forgot.
[/quote]

I remember there was something about him and his friend in a car accident or something, I’m sure it had something to do with that he was banned for. It was too long ago for me to remember 100%.[/quote]

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:20, topic:445239”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=547922.msg4017796#msg4017796 date=1339780611]

Yes he was a mod and then he was banned for some reason I forgot.

I remember there was something about him and his friend in a car accident or something, I’m sure it had something to do with that he was banned for. It was too long ago for me to remember 100%.
[/quote]
He killed his best friend so he could get mod because his friend was going to get it or something :s[/quote]

The truth is,

It was just over a year ago. I can still remember that day. Such a cold, sad day. You see, we used to have a moderator named Ownager3. He was a great moderator, and most peoples favorite. He was just recently promoted to global moderator. You see, Ikiliki was also a moderator. They knew each other in real life, and would often hang out and were just generally friends. They were out driving when Ikiliki got into a car accident. Not your typical accident, an extremely critical one. It took place on a bridge and the car flew into the sea below. Ikiliki quickly got out and Ownager3 was dorwning. He could've saved Ownager3, but greed overtook him. He knew if Ownager3 was gone, he would be the favorite. He would be the new global moderator. And so, he fled form the car and ran away, leaving Ownager3 to die.

People becan to notice Ownager3 was not visiting the forum. Ikiliki just told them he was having real-life problems. Until a member here, named Niall, decided to look him up and see if he could get into contact with him. That's when he stumbled across an article detailing the horrendous crash. There it was, Ikiliki and Ownager3's names. Jon, Ownager3's first name, had drowned. Mircaulously, Ikiliki had escaped. The article included an interview where Hank (Ikiliki) had told that he had tried desperately to get Jon out, but failed. Niall confronted Ikiliki, and asked about it. Strangely, Ikiliki cracked. He told Niall the whole story. About how he had placed a forum position before a friend's life. Niall was outraged and banned Ikiliki.

The story is still secret, and this post is against the rules. Niall will most likely ban me for this post, but I feel it's needed.

[center][size=90pt]R.I.P.
Ownager3[/size][/center]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:6, topic:445239”]Pretty sure R-L was made from the people who got out-casted from here because of their dumbass posts and R-S was made from the people who got out-casted from here because they want to sell services.

Especially since we got a spam topic from a guy who could barely spell from R-L saying this site sucked and R-L was so much better.[/quote]
this right here with the exception of this

[quote=“mopman_sucks, post:45, topic:445239”]you guys are partially wrong on the whole R-S scene so let me use my oldfaggotry here.

Kaitnieks was the first “private server” community if you will. then came moparisthebest.com, sometime shortly after mitb took over a user called phate started R-S it was actually just a playable server at the time then the source was released and the community was formed

Shortly after the seperation of mitb and moparscape R-S mysteriously closed. at some point the domain was sold to keven who claimed he had this amazing server for years (i can’t confirm if it was ever released because I stopped caring)

fasga also had a website that was around the same time as R-S i don’t remember what happened to it.

SAY NO TO SILAB ITEMS, SAY YES TO JAGEX ITEMS![/quote]

item.title: First RSPS Community
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:46, topic:445239”][quote author=mopman_sucks link=topic=547922.msg4018650#msg4018650 date=1339850948]
Shortly after the seperation of mitb and moparscape R-S mysteriously closed. at some point the domain was sold to keven who claimed he had this amazing server for years (i can’t confirm if it was ever released because I stopped caring)
[/quote]
I believe it was released, as there is a largely popular base called rune-server over there. iirc it had you as an author to one of the classes I was looking at… I guess a lot of people contributed to it or whatever, peterbjornx wrote a embeddable language for it called runescript, graham wrote the combat with some guy named scu11 and everyone over there rages it is the best combat. Also believe it was originally hyperion.

Was phate and/or keven ever a member of MITB/Kaitnieks?[/quote]Phate was, Kevin wasn’t from what I’ve heard. Originally there was an R-S private server, which had basic fletching and I believe only PvM combat or something ridiculous. Then the “Official R-S private server” came out, with devs such as Graham, Peter, Scu, and a couple of others.

Read full topic

item.title: First RSPS Community
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

[quote=“Alec_, post:1, topic:445245”]everyone in this topic seems to be getting it wrong, so:

Kaitnieks and MITB weren’t RSPS communities, they were rs cheating communities. When rsps started getting popular mitb transferred private server discussion to moparscape. R-L was made by god of ikiliki, a global mod on mitb/mscp. R-S was made by some fag named kevy.

[hr]

Also, rune-server made there community for money. There a bunch of 12 year olds. There staff never do anything it’s just ridiculous >.< there administrator assistant hasnt touched the requests section in forever.

Yeah, on MSCP we just have idiots like you who can’t use English worth dick…[/quote]

I heard kaits had a private server section towards the end.

gtfo.

Kaits
MITB
This shit hole
R-S
Niggerliki’s site.

item.title: First RSPS Community
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:15, topic:445239”]If I recall correctly the first server was made on Kaitnieks and it was c++, and then quickly ported to Java.

Then came Moparisthebest after Kaitnieks shut down, Moparisthebest included Moparscape private server boards at that time.

The boards were then moved to Moparscape

R-S and R-L were created by runaway moparscapers, and thus they still continue to harvest elitist idiots. Not to mention the forums are trashy as hell.[/quote]
Most accurate so far.

Also, I believe R-S came before R-L.

Read full topic

item.title: First RSPS Community
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:34, topic:445239”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=547922.msg4017867#msg4017867 date=1339784020]

Wait I thought the rule was if you use both accounts. If you quit your old account and create a new account then it’s not really account breaking. That’s what I was told o_o

My old account, Paradox, I forgot the password to. That’s why I have this account lmao. I made Paradox back in 2006, but then I used R-S and stuff then eventually came back here as this. Although, anyone who does know me will know me as Ruby and not Paradox. So I don’t believe that this is against the rules seeing as I forgot my stuff for the other account.
[/quote]
Oh so your paradox_ on rune-server :|[/quote]
Nah, I’m “` Ruby”. I was “Paradox” on R-S too, I quit RSPS for a while to go into serious website development projects, eventually returning around this time two years ago under the name of Ruby, unfortunately Ruby was taken on here and at the time I was still a kid, so I made “Ruby Forums Coder” which is literally the worst name on mopar, lol.

EDIT: Thanks to Taharok and Frell, I got my name changed.

Read full topic
